numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
3. I wonder how these graphs might be different in past years.
4. I think that these graphs would be very different in past years.
6. This situation reflects racism in today's world.
7. All people are supposed to be equal.
8. However, all people are not equal.
9. The headline is: Racism on the Field.
